mapper.select: select id, account_id, match_id, player_slot, hero_id, item0, item1, item2, item3, item4, item5, backpack0, backpack1, backpack2, kills, deaths, assists, last_hits, denies, gold_per_min, xp_per_min, level, hero_damage, tower_damage, hero_healing, gold, gold_spent, scaled_hero_damage, scaled_tower_damage, scaled_hero_healing from beibei_major.web_match_player_info where id = #{id}

select id, account_id, match_id, player_slot, hero_id, item0, item1, item2, item3, item4, item5, backpack0, backpack1, backpack2, kills, deaths, assists, last_hits, denies, gold_per_min, xp_per_min, level, hero_damage, tower_damage, hero_healing, gold, gold_spent, scaled_hero_damage, scaled_tower_damage, scaled_hero_healing from beibei_major.web_match_player_info limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into beibei_major.web_match_player_info(account_id, match_id, player_slot, hero_id, item0, item1, item2, item3, item4, item5, backpack0, backpack1, backpack2, kills, deaths, assists, last_hits, denies, gold_per_min, xp_per_min, level, hero_damage, tower_damage, hero_healing, gold, gold_spent, scaled_hero_damage, scaled_tower_damage, scaled_hero_healing) values (#{accountId}, #{matchId}, #{playerSlot}, #{heroId}, #{item0}, #{item1}, #{item2}, #{item3}, #{item4}, #{item5}, #{backpack0}, #{backpack1}, #{backpack2}, #{kills}, #{deaths}, #{assists}, #{lastHits}, #{denies}, #{goldPerMin}, #{xpPerMin}, #{level}, #{heroDamage}, #{towerDamage}, #{heroHealing}, #{gold}, #{goldSpent}, #{scaledHeroDamage}, #{scaledTowerDamage}, #{scaledHeroHealing})
mapper.update:
update beibei_major.web_match_player_info
account_id = #{accountId},
match_id = #{matchId},
player_slot = #{playerSlot},
hero_id = #{heroId},
item0 = #{item0},
item1 = #{item1},
item2 = #{item2},
item3 = #{item3},
item4 = #{item4},
item5 = #{item5},
backpack0 = #{backpack0},
backpack1 = #{backpack1},
backpack2 = #{backpack2},
kills = #{kills},
deaths = #{deaths},
assists = #{assists},
last_hits = #{lastHits},
denies = #{denies},
gold_per_min = #{goldPerMin},
xp_per_min = #{xpPerMin},
level = #{level},
hero_damage = #{heroDamage},
tower_damage = #{towerDamage},
hero_healing = #{heroHealing},
gold = #{gold},
gold_spent = #{goldSpent},
scaled_hero_damage = #{scaledHeroDamage},
scaled_tower_damage = #{scaledTowerDamage},
scaled_hero_healing = #{scaledHeroHealing},
where id = #{id}
mapper.insert:
insert into web_match_player_info(account_id, match_id, player_slot, hero_id, item0, item1, item2, item3, item4, item5, backpack0, backpack1, backpack2, kills, deaths, assists, last_hits, denies, gold_per_min, xp_per_min, level, hero_damage, tower_damage, hero_healing, gold, gold_spent, scaled_hero_damage, scaled_tower_damage, scaled_hero_healing) values
(#{item.accountId}, #{item.matchId}, #{item.playerSlot}, #{item.heroId}, #{item.item0}, #{item.item1}, #{item.item2}, #{item.item3}, #{item.item4}, #{item.item5}, #{item.backpack0}, #{item.backpack1}, #{item.backpack2}, #{item.kills}, #{item.deaths}, #{item.assists}, #{item.lastHits}, #{item.denies}, #{item.goldPerMin}, #{item.xpPerMin}, #{item.level}, #{item.heroDamage}, #{item.towerDamage}, #{item.heroHealing}, #{item.gold}, #{item.goldSpent}, #{item.scaledHeroDamage}, #{item.scaledTowerDamage}, #{item.scaledHeroHealing})
